Name: Radiant Stone
Description: It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and boots.
Description$english: It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and boots.
Description2$english: A unique composite material made by heritage Forging techniques, with flowing light traces on the surface like liquid sunlight, reminiscent of the radiance at noon, hence the name.

recipes.Name: Radiant Stone
recipes.Des: Use Azte Ore to create Radiant Stone for Refine, which can refine earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and shoes to enhance their performance.
recipes.Des$english: Use Azte Ore to create Radiant Stone for Refine, which can refine earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and shoes to enhance their performance.

recipes.Name: Radiant Stone - Beginner
recipes.Des: Use Azte Ore to create Radiant Stone for Refine, which can refine earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and shoes to enhance their performance.
recipes.Des$english: Use Azte Ore to create Radiant Stone for Refine, which can refine earrings, necklaces, gauntlets, and shoes to enhance their performance.

NeedMaterial.Name: Azte Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into Radiant Stones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After smelting, it can be converted into Radiant Stones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The color is dark gray with a yellowish tint, and the luster is slightly weak. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm.

NeedMaterial.Name: Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder
NeedMaterial.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

recipes.Name: Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder ×15
recipes.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.
recipes.Des$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

NeedMaterial.Name: Charcoal
NeedMaterial.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

recipes.Name: Charcoal ×10
recipes.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!
recipes.Des$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

NeedMaterial.Name: Pine Timber
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipes.Name: Radiant Stone - Master
recipes.Des: Producing Radiant Stone with Azte Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklace, gauntlets, and shoes.
recipes.Des$english: Producing Radiant Stone with Azte Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklace, gauntlets, and shoes.

NeedMaterial.Name: Azte Rich Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
The color is dark gray with a yellowish tint, and the luster is slightly weak. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters and have a much higher mineral content than ordinary raw stones, but their yield is lower, making them naturally more expensive.

recipes.Name: Radiant Stone - Master
recipes.Des: Producing Radiant Stone with Azte Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklace, gauntlets, and shoes.
recipes.Des$english: Producing Radiant Stone with Azte Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, necklace, gauntlets, and shoes.

NeedMaterial.Name: Azte Pure Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into an even larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After smelting, it can be converted into an even larger quantity of Radiant Stones used for Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
The color is dark gray with a yellowish tint, and the luster is slightly weak. The texture of the ore is relatively uniform, with no obvious flaws. Its moderate hardness makes it easy to cut and polish, which is precisely its charm.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration. Some refined ores will crystallize, having a much higher content than ordinary raw stones, making them very rare.
